abstract: A new policy banning meat, poultry and fish products raises ire in Goa.
snippet: A new policy banning meat, poultry and fish products raises ire in Goa.
lead_paragraph: Goa's ever-active Internet discussion groups have been buzzing in recent days with complaints about a new Jet Airways policy banning passengers from carrying meat, fish and poultry products on both domestic and international flights even in their checked-in luggage.
